name.baseName: Soil and groundwater remediation;Ex-situ;groundwater pump and treat;construction;Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
土壤和地下水修复;原位;地下水抽出处理;施工;到达现场的设备和材料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Distance 100 km assumed, transport of GeoProbe 4.65 t, plus other construction materials.
假设距离 100 公里，运输 GeoProbe 4.65 吨，外加其他建筑材料。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: a closed pesticide manufacturing plant located in Jiangsu Province, China.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Distance 100 km assumed, transport of GeoProbe 4.65 t, plus other construction materials.
假设距离 100 公里，运输 GeoProbe 4.65 吨，外加其他建筑材料。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is used for the remediation of soil and groundwater contaminated at a closed pesticide manufacturing plant located in Jiangsu Province, China. The ex-situ groundwater pump and treat approach involves the extraction of groundwater to remove contaminants. The construction phase includes the transportation of remediation equipment, such as the GeoProbe unit weighing 4.65 tons, and additional construction materials over a distance of 100 km.
所述工业过程用于中国江苏省一个已关闭的农药制造厂的土壤和地下水污染修复。原位地下水抽出处理方法包括提取地下水以去除污染物。施工阶段包括运输修复设备，如重量为4.65吨的GeoProbe装置，以及额外的建筑材料，假定运输距离为100公里。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, D. et al. Assessing the environmental impacts and costs of biochar and monitored natural attenuation for groundwater heavily contaminated with volatile organic compounds. Science of The Total Environment 846, 157316 (2022).

Ding, D. et al. Assessing the environmental impacts and costs of biochar and monitored natural attenuation for groundwater heavily contaminated with volatile organic compounds. Science of The Total Environment 846, 157316 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this data set in Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), ensure to match the geographical context and technological applicability to the assessed scenario. Account for any transportation of equipment and materials based on the assumed 100 km distance. The specific use phase behavior, such as the duration and intensity of the remediation, should be modeled according to the characteristics of the site and the contamination profile. Additionally, consider the end-of-life phase for the equipment and any possible recycling or disposal impacts in the LCA.
在生命周期评估（LCA）中应用此数据集时，请确保所评估的场景与地理背景和技术适用性相匹配。根据假定的100公里距离，计算所有设备和材料的运输。特定的使用阶段行为，如修复的持续时间和强度，应根据现场和污染概况的特征进行建模。此外，在LCA中考虑设备的终生阶段以及任何可能的回收或处置影响。

completeness.common:other: Input kilometers* tons, output equipment and materials arriving on site
输入公里*吨，输出到达现场的设备和材料

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: GeoProbe和其他材料运输到现场的距离

exchange.generalComment: 到达场地的 GeoProbe和其他材料
